resources.string: To get started, we need to request the Record Audio permission. This is required for pitch detection, but we don\'t record or transmit audio in any way.

We noticed you have disabled the Record Audio permission. This app is unable to run without that permission. We cannot detect frequencies without the microphone. Hit OK to go to the application settings where you can re-enable the permission. Hit CANCEL to exit.
Select a frequency for Middle A:
Thanks for granting the permission. Would you like a brief intro?
This indicator lights up when you are close to an instrument note, and shows how sharp or flat you are in relation to that note.
This is the note you are closest to chromatically, and the indicators show how sharp or flat you are in relation to that note.
You can tap here (or in the settings menu) to select an instrument.
You can tap here (or in the settings menu) to change the middle A frequency.
